mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of President Johnson signing the Civil Rights Act of 1964
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rapp, O. J.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: President Lyndon B. Johnson signing the Civil Rights Act of 1964. A group of Congressmen are standing around him as he signs the document.
